data.eml:eml: New species and records of the genus Lesteva Latreille, 1797 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae) from Jiangxi province, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shavrin, Alexey V. (2013): New species and records of the genus Lesteva Latreille, 1797 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae) from Jiangxi province, China. Zootaxa 3681 (1): 93-95, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3681.1.8
